title: Full Path Disclosure

profile.name: ownCloud
profile.about: ownCloud GmbH is the company behind the ownCloud Project - the most downloaded open source project for data and file sync, share and view.

vulnerability_information:
When I was trying to load a file which is not actually exist then it shows 
{"message":"Could not obtain lock type 1 on \"\/opt\/lampp\/htdocs\/owncloud\/data\/admin\/files\/lol\"."}


Request 

GET /owncloud/index.php/apps/files_texteditor/ajax/loadfile?filename=lol HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.105
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Ubuntu; Linux x86_64; rv:40.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/40.0
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en-US,en;q=0.5
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate
requesttoken: JsTZTCWPxW2INuw7Ur1bgkLlmwQY0a
OCS-APIREQUEST: true
X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequest
Referer: http://192.168.0.105/owncloud/index.php/apps/files/
Cookie: ochwk513zixt=am12pvu6bbmi3u03jbbk64v5f2
Connection: keep-alive

Response 

HTTP/1.1 400 Bad request
Date: Thu, 27 Aug 2015 14:07:54 GMT
Server: Apache/2.4.16 (Unix) OpenSSL/1.0.1p PHP/5.6.11 mod_perl/2.0.8-dev Perl/v5.16.3
X-Powered-By: PHP/5.6.11
Expires: Thu, 19 Nov 1981 08:52:00 GMT
Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none';script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval';style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline';img-src 'self';font-src 'self';connect-src 'self';media-src 'self'
Content-Length: 106
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
X-Robots-Tag: none
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN
Connection: close
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8

{"message":"Could not obtain lock type 1 on \"\/opt\/lampp\/htdocs\/owncloud\/data\/admin\/files\/lol\"."}




Thanks.

activities.message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. We take security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this bug until we have determined a potential patch.
 
Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks a lot for reporting this potential issue back to us. We take security very seriously and would appreciate if you would not share any information about this bug until we have determined a potential patch.

Our security team will take a look at this issue as soon as possible. We will reply to your report within 72 hours, usually much faster.

activities.message:
Nice catch! We have confirmed this vulnerability and have escalated this internally.

We will now proceed as following:

1. Work on a patch and send it back to you to request it for verification
2. Validate the impact and determine a potential bounty payout
3. Release an advisory and an update

For 3 can you please let me know how you want to get credited on our advisory on https://owncloud.org/security/advisories/ ? - Please include:

1. Your name
2. E-mail (optional)
3. Company (optional)

That said the impact of a Full Path Disclosure is usually considered low and is thus likely going to be on the lower end of our bounty prices.
activities.markdown_message:
Nice catch! We have confirmed this vulnerability and have escalated this internally.

We will now proceed as following:

  1. Work on a patch and send it back to you to request it for verification
  2. Validate the impact and determine a potential bounty payout
  3. Release an advisory and an update

For 3 can you please let me know how you want to get credited on our advisory on https://owncloud.org/security/advisories/ ? - Please include:

  1. Your name
  2. E-mail (optional)
  3. Company (optional)

That said the impact of a Full Path Disclosure is usually considered low and is thus likely going to be on the lower end of our bounty prices.

activities.message: We have a potential patch at https://github.com/owncloud/files_texteditor/pull/97/files, can I ask you to verify that this change fixes the problem?
activities.markdown_message: We have a potential patch at https://github.com/owncloud/files_texteditor/pull/97/files, can I ask you to verify that this change fixes the problem?

activities.message:
Due to the fact that this bug has only minor security impact that will not lead to a direct exploitation we are going to award $25 to it.

Please notice that we did not yet release a fixed release and we will mark this issue as fixed as soon as we have pushed patches releases.
activities.markdown_message:
Due to the fact that this bug has only minor security impact that will not lead to a direct exploitation we are going to award $25 to it.

Please notice that we did not yet release a fixed release and we will mark this issue as fixed as soon as we have pushed patches releases.

activities.message:
Thanks @lukasreschke  for bounty.
Name:  Md. Ishrat Shahriyar
Twitter: https://twitter.com/meshahriyar
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks @lukasreschke for bounty.
Name: Md. Ishrat Shahriyar
Twitter: https://twitter.com/meshahriyar

activities.message:
Thanks a lot again. We have meanwhile fixed this with ownCloud 8.1.4 and ownCloud 8.0.9 in October 2015 but didn't yet release advisories for it to the general public.

I just created a change request for the advisory and the advisory should appear within the next day at https://owncloud.org/security/advisory/?id=oc-sa-2016-004
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks a lot again. We have meanwhile fixed this with ownCloud 8.1.4 and ownCloud 8.0.9 in October 2015 but didn't yet release advisories for it to the general public.

I just created a change request for the advisory and the advisory should appear within the next day at https://owncloud.org/security/advisory/?id=oc-sa-2016-004
